4:

Text: Navarathri (1964 film):  The record of playing most number of roles in one Indian film was made by Sivaji Ganesan followed by Telugu with the same title and in Hindi as "Naya Din Nai Raat" (1974)with Sanjeev Kumar and Kamal Haasan in "Dasavathaaram" (2008).
